5.name: Narration
5.text:
Along with the sound of the strange bird, a
massive body descends from the sky and mows down
the surroundings. Its physique is that of a giant
carnivorous beast, but its head is that of a
majestic eagle. Large wings flap on its back,
matching its massive body.

8.name: Peddler
8.text:
"Oh no, the horse is being eaten...!! Run
away...!!"

15.name: Griffin
15.text:
"Kweeeeeeeee!!! (How about it? Become a female
horse with my ●●●!!)"

16.name: Mare
16.text:
"Neighhhhhhh!!! (No, please forgive meeee!!!)
(Nooooo...!! I have a husband...!!) (Aaaahh!! I'm
going to get pregnant with the griffin's
●●●...!!)"

18.name: Sol
18.text:
"Ooooo... Griffin NTR... The door to a new world
opens..."

20.name: Peddler
20.text:
"It seems... that griffin is in heat. A griffin in
heat, not hungry, sexually assaults mares."

21.name: Peddler
21.text:
"Once it's finished mating with the mare, it will
be satisfied and leave. In fact, if we were to
interrupt the copulation, it would likely become
furious like a raging fire..."

23.name: Peddler
23.text:
"Above all, because a hippogriff is born between a
griffin and a horse, it is very much appreciated
by us..."

24.name: Eric
24.text:
"It's pitiful, but... is it asking her to betray
her husband and commit adultery here?"

25.name: Sol
25.text:
"Ooooo... A midday affair between a magical beast
and a married woman..."

34.name: Kobold
34.text:
(Thank you very much!!!) (Thank you very much,
Lord Golden Dragon!!!) (Thanks to you, the ladies
are also safe!!!)

37.name: Kobold
37.text:
(We will dedicate ourselves to serving Lady Sol.
Please allow us to take care of everything around
you.) (If it's tunnel digging, we won't lose to
anyone. We will make Lady Sol's residence
splendid!)

38.name: Sol
38.text:
"Um, well then, please take care of me! Let's get
along well, okay?"

42.name: Narration
42.text:
At the summit of the mountain, the magical beast
lay sprawled out in an open area. Around it,
various pieces of flesh from the victims it had
presumably devoured were scattered in a gruesome
manner.

43.name: Narration
43.text:
The magical beast with a human face, reveling in a
sinister smirk, leapt into the air as soon as it
laid eyes on Sol and the others.

44.name: Narration
44.text:
"The next prey will be you. I will devour your
intestines while watching you scream in
agony──────!!"

47.name: Narration
47.text:
The magical beast lay dying, letting out a pitiful
death cry filled with agony. However, it was not
even allowed that, as it received a blow from the
warrior's axe, shattering its skull.

48.name: Narration
48.text:
The magical beast, which had been convulsing for a
while, finally lost its strength, and silence fell
over the surroundings.

51.name: Kobold
51.text:
(Thank you very much!!!) (Thank you very much,
Lady Sol!!!) (Thanks to you, everyone is safe!!!)

54.name: Kobold
54.text:
(We will devote ourselves to Lady Sol. Please let
us take care of the surroundings!)

55.name: Kobold
55.text:
(We won't lose to anyone in tunnel digging. We
will make Lady Sol's residence magnificent!)

56.name: Sol
56.text:
"Um, well then, please take care of me! Let's get
along well, okay?!"
